system.description:
A blackjack, also known as a cosh, is a small leather club usually filled with sand. Blackjacks are too soft to do significant damage, but are very useful for temporarily knocking people unconscious without doing permanent damage.

The weapon has no effect on those wearing metal armor of any sort, or any unarmored monster of AC 0 or less. See rules for other details about this weapon, including the ability to knockout, stun and delay the victim.
